text: The Bowls England National Championships (Johns Trophy) is one of the events at the annual Bowls England National Championships. ==Past Winners== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- !width="50"|Year !width="250"|Champion !width="250"|Runner-up |- | align=center|2008|| Hampshire ||Hertfordshire |- | align=center|2009||Nottinghamshire ||Oxfordshire |- | align=center|2010||Hertfordshire ||Somerset |- | align=center|2011||Hampshire ||Devon |- | align=center|2012||Lincolnshire ||Devon |- | align=center|2013|| Devon ||Suffolk |- | align=center|2014||Surrey ||Devon |- | align=center|2015||Surrey ||Leicestershire |- | align=center|2016||Lincolnshire ||Kent |- | align=center|2017||Kent ||Norfolk |- | align=center|2018||Surrey ||Wiltshire |- | align=center|2019||Surrey ||Wiltshire |- |align=center|2020|| cancelled || due to the COVID-19 pandemic. |} ==References== Category:Bowls in England
